news_header: Boeing reports significant losses in Q3 due to issues in its defense and space department and the impact of the 737 Max accidents.
news_text: Boeing announced losses of $6.2 billion in the third quarter, attributed to security issues and challenges in its defense and space division. Net sales fell to $17.8 billion. The company's difficulties were compounded by the fallout from two accidents involving the 737 Max model in 2018 and 2019.
